text: Hugh was born in 1763. He was the eldest son of Andrew Jackson Sr and Elizabeth Hutchinson Jackson. He had only 2 siblings, Robert, born in 1764 and Andrew born March 15, 1767, he was a volunteer aka solider during the Revolutionary War, and died during the Battle of Sterno Ferry in 1779, He was 16 years . Category:1762 births Category:1779 deaths Category:American revolutionaries
title: Hugh Jackson II
